name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song '嗚呼、素晴らしきニャン生' (Aa, Subarashiki Nyansei).
scenes.song_name: 嗚呼、素晴らしきニャン生

subtitles.original: 生き方はにゃんにゃんにゃん そう簡単には分からないの
subtitles.english: Way of life is nyan nyan nyan, it's not so easy to understand

subtitles.original: それ、私を飼っている 女の子を一人にできないわ
subtitles.english: That's because I can't leave the girl who owns me all alone

subtitles.original: 話の途中よ にゃんにゃんにゃん あらもう行っちゃうのね ちょっと
subtitles.english: I'm still talking, nyan nyan nyan, oh, you're leaving already? Hey!

subtitles.original: 明日はここに来たいのよ
subtitles.english: I want to come here tomorrow

subtitles.original: 待ってるから
subtitles.english: I'll be waiting for you

subtitles.original: Blessing for your birthday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your birthday

subtitles.original: Blessing for your everyday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your everyday

subtitles.original: 最後の一秒まで前を向け
subtitles.english: Keep your head up until the very last second

subtitles.original: Blessing 作詞・作曲：halyosy
subtitles.english: Blessing Lyrics/Composition: halyosy

subtitles.original: 剥がしても何故だか増えていくタグと
subtitles.english: The tags that somehow keep increasing even if you peel them off

subtitles.original: ランク付けされていく理不尽な価値
subtitles.english: And the unreasonable values that are ranked

subtitles.original: そんなもので人を推し量らないでと
subtitles.english: Don't measure people by such things

subtitles.original: 飛び交う言葉を手で覆い隠した
subtitles.english: Covered the flying words with hands

subtitles.original: Oh, it's time to get up 灯火を消す前に
subtitles.english: Oh, it's time to get up, before the light goes out

subtitles.original: Oh, it's time to get up 足元を照らして
subtitles.english: Oh, it's time to get up, light up your path

subtitles.original: ほらここをじっと見つめてみて
subtitles.english: Look, stare right here

subtitles.original: 最高の味方が写ってるでしょ
subtitles.english: Your best ally is reflected there, right?

subtitles.original: それは命の証
subtitles.english: That is the proof of life

subtitles.original: Blessing for your birthday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your birthday

subtitles.original: Blessing for your everyday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your everyday

subtitles.original: 例え明日世界が滅んでも
subtitles.english: Even if the world ends tomorrow

subtitles.original: Blessing for your birthday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your birthday

subtitles.original: Blessing for your everyday
subtitles.english: Blessing for your everyday

subtitles.original: 最後の一秒まで前を向け
subtitles.english: Keep your head up until the very last second

subtitles.original: Hip hip hooray これから先も
subtitles.english: Hip hip hooray, from now on too

subtitles.original: Hip hip hooray 君に幸あれ
subtitles.english: Hip hip hooray, may luck be with you

subtitles.original: ゼロからイチを生むのは容易くないこと
subtitles.english: Creating one from zero is not an easy thing

subtitles.original: 肝心なものは見えないし触れないこと
subtitles.english: The essential things can't be seen or touched

subtitles.original: 不幸とは幸せだと気づけないこと
subtitles.english: Misfortune is not realizing that you are happy

subtitles.original: 毎日が誕生日でめでたいこと
subtitles.english: The fact that every day is a birthday and worth celebrating

subtitles.original: Oh, stand up, take action 泥沼を掻き分けて
subtitles.english: Oh, stand up, take action, push through the mire

subtitles.original: Oh, stand up, take action 蓮の花は咲く
subtitles.english: Oh, stand up, take action, the lotus flower will bloom

subtitles.original: ほらここに手を重ねてみて
subtitles.english: Look, try layering your hands here

subtitles.original: 温もりが伝わってくるでしょ
subtitles.english: You can feel the warmth, right?

subtitles.original: それは命の証
subtitles.english: That is the proof of life

subtitles.english: Blessing for your birthday

subtitles.english: Blessing for your everyday

subtitles.original: 例え綺麗事だって構わない
subtitles.english: Even if it's just lip service, I don't care

subtitles.original: この世に産まれてくれてありがとう

subtitles.english: Come one, come all, gather 'round and see!

subtitles.english: In rock style, it's like this, like this, like this, yeah

subtitles.english: In a cappella style, it's like this, like this, like this, yeah

subtitles.original: よく食べて
subtitles.english: Eat well

subtitles.original: よく眠って
subtitles.english: Sleep well

subtitles.original: よく遊んで
subtitles.english: Play well
